ratings.comment: Awesome professor! One of the best I've had yet!

It was an honor taking a class with Profe Griffin. He is extraordinarily dedicated to his students and their success. His class is interactive, engaging, thought provoking, and a great experience overall. He makes the language easier to understand and will do whatever he can to help students grasp the concepts.

Best teacher I've ever had. Makes personal connections with all of his students and does everything in his power to ensure success for his students. Not only is he funny and a kind teacher, he is extremely caring and understanding of his students.

Profe Griffin is incredible. He makes an effort to get to know you while enabling you to succeed, and makes class enjoyable and funny. While I think he could do more to enforce a Spanish speaking environment among students in the classroom, I can tell that he supports his students' learning styles, however different they may be.

Profe Griffin was most certainly the best teacher I had my first semester in college. He teaches the class in an entertaining way and it feels completely personal. He doesn't just lecture or teach grammar rather interacts one on one with each student, learns their name, says hello in the hallways, and is always accessible and willing to talk. 10/10
Great prof, always wants you to succeed.

Taking Spanish 102 with profe was a great experience. Even though the class was taught completely in Spanish, he made sure to use language that was familiar to us. I definitely recommend him to those taking Spanish in the future.
One of the best teachers that I've had. He is extremely helpful and does his best to clearly explain everything and anything that may be confusing

He is genuinely one of the best teachers that I have ever experienced, and is willing to go WAY out of his way to help with whatever.  You do not have to be afraid to ask him questions and he is very enthusiastic, encouraging, helpful, and easy to understand.  Spanish can be a really intimidating course, however he makes it enjoyable :)
Best TA I've ever had. Always willing to help. Perfect for introduction levels of Spanish grading wise, not too tough on language and grammatical use. I would definitely recommend him.
